name: Deep Dive in Hyperspace
description:
Deep Dive in Hyperspace

Avoid obstacles while flying through space at hyperspeed !

Made in 10h for Ludum Dare 48 ; the theme was "Deeper and Deeper".

Controls

Move - Arrow keys

Dash - X key

Tips

Every 25 seconds, the speed will go up and the difficulty will increase !

You can use your dash to destroy asteroids in your way ; however, the red projectiles will still damage you during your dash !

Destroying more than one asteroid in a single dash will award you with one extra hit point !

Your total combo count is tracked throughout the game, so try to get as many as you can !

Development

I didn't feel inspired at all during the weekend, until I finally was, 10 hours before the end of the compo. So this game is pretty rushed and definitely still needs some work ! I hope you can still have somewhat of an enjoyable time with it !
